lesser ancestor totem.benefits: gain a +2 insight bonus to a skill (that you can use while raging) while raging

ancestor totem.benefits: gain a +4 insight bonus to a skill while raging, and you may use it while raging even if you normally couldnt

greater ancestor totem.benefits: gain a +6 insight bonus to a skill while raging, and you may use it while raging even if you normally couldnt. Once per rage you may spend a round of rage to reroll a skill check of that skill.

armor ripper.benefits: gain a bonus to sunder checks with your natural attacks while raging

lesser atavism totem.benefits: you gain a bite attack; or if you already have a bite attack, it deals damage as if you were one size larger.

auspicious mark.benefits: gain a bonus on a roll once per rage

battle roar.benefits: you deal an additional 1d6 points of sonic damage to an opponent you successfully demoralized using intimidating glare.

bestial climber.benefits: climb at your normal land speed while raging

bestial leaper.benefits: take a standard action while moving during a rage

bestial swimmer.benefits: swim at your normal land speed while raging

bleeding blow.benefits: deal bleed damage with your powerful blows

bloody bite.prerequisites: half-orc, animal fury rage power or a natural bite attack
bloody bite.benefits: your bite attack deals 1d6 points of bleed damage in addition to its other effects.

bloody fist.benefits: once per rage, the barbarian may attempt to punch through an opponents flesh and rip out one of its vital organs. In order to do so, the barbarian must confirm a critical hit against an opponent with a natural attack or unarmed strike. The barbarian deals damage as normal for a critical hit and the opponent must succeed at a fortitude save (dc = 10 + 1/2 the barbarians class level + the barbarians strength modifier) or take 1d4 points of constitution damage as one of its vital organs is ripped free from its body.

boars charge.benefits: automatically score critical hits with your gore attack while raging

boasting taunt.benefits: force an enemy to attack the barbarian

body bludgeon.benefits: beat a foe with another creature

brawler.benefits: gain improved unarmed strike while raging

breathtaker.benefits: while raging, whenever you make a successful melee attack against an opponent that is holding its breath, in addition to any other effects caused by that attack, the opponent loses a number of rounds of breath equal to your strength modifier.

lesser celestial totem.benefits: whenever subjected to a spell that cures hp damage, heal 1 additional hp per caster level. In the case of non-spell healing effects (such as channeled energy or lay on hands), heal a number of additional hp equal to the class level of the character performing the magical healing.

celestial totem.benefits: gain a halo that shines as daylight and triggers invisibility purge (only reveals non-good creatures) in the barbarians square and each adjacent square.

greater celestial totem.benefits: gain sr while raging equal to 11 + barbarian class level against spells with the evil descriptor; also gain +2 bonus on all saves against spells and effects from evil creatures.

lesser chaos totem.benefits: gain a deflection bonus to ac and a resistance bonus against lawful spells and creatures

chaos totem.benefits: gain a bonus to escape artist and a chance to avoid critical hits

greater chaos totem.benefits: gain damage resistance against lawful spells and creatures

come and get me.benefits: you may make an attack of opportunity against a foe that charges you, even if you cant make attacks of opportunity. You must take a full attack action to use this power.

contagious flame.benefits: anyone who strikes you with a non-reach melee attack takes fire damage.

deadly accuracy.benefits: take a penalty to your melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to gain a bonus on your damage rolls.

greater deadly accuracy.benefits: take a penalty to your melee attack rolls and combat maneuver checks to gain a bonus on your damage rolls.

disruptive.benefits: whenever an opponent provokes an attack of opportunity from the witch hunter, the opponent must succeed at a will save (dc 10 + 1/2 the witch hunters class level + the witch hunters wisdom modifier) or its action is wasted.

elemental blood.benefits: you gain energy resistance 5 against a type of energy associated with your elemental heritage while raging. This resistance increases by 5 at 5th level and every 3 levels thereafter. In addition, your natural attacks and melee attacks with weapons you wield deal an additional 1d6 points of damage of the chosen energy type.

greater elemental blood.benefits: in addition to the benefits described in elemental blood, you gain immunity to a type of energy associated with your elemental heritage.

energy eruption.benefits: while raging, as a standard action you can cause your elemental blood to erupt in a 5-foot-radius burst. Creatures in this area take energy damage equal to your elemental blood damage.

erupting fist.benefits: your elemental fist punches deal extra damage.

fearful.benefits: frighten opponents with your critical hits

greater fearful.benefits: cause creatures damaged by your critical hit to be shaken

feasting bite.benefits: you gain a bite attack. You can use your bite attack as a standard action that deals 1d6 + 1-1/2 times your strength modifier points of damage.

greater feasting bite.benefits: when you successfully hit with a bite attack, you gain 5 temporary hit points.

greater fiend totem.benefits: gain a bonus to intimidate checks and a bonus to critical confirmation rolls

flesh wound.benefits: your critical hit inflicts a debuff on the opponent

flensing fury.benefits: once per rage you may choose to forgo any damage from a single successful critical hit with a piercing or slashing melee attack to deal bleed damage equal to your strength modifier.

foe breaker.benefits: add your strength modifier to your cmb when performing drag or overrun combat maneuvers

foe rend.benefits: whenever you score a critical hit, you may rend the opponent as a swift action. Rending deals additional damage equal to your strength modifier.

folklorist.benefits: gain bardic knowledge and identify creatures by type.

ghost rager.benefits: deal normal damage to incorporeal creatures

good for what ails you.benefits: drink alcohol to gain a new save against conditions

greater animal fury.benefits: as animal fury, but your bite attack deals damage as if you were one size larger.

ground breaker.benefits: attack the ground to create difficult terrain

greater ground breaker.benefits: extend ground breakers radius of difficult terrain

guarded life.benefits: stabilize when at negative hit points

greater guarded life.benefits: convert more damage to nonlethal damage

guarded stance.benefits: gain a dodge bonus to ac

hive totem.benefits: take half damage from swarms while raging

hive totem resilience.benefits: take no damage from swarms while raging

hive totem toxicity.prerequisites: barbarian 8, hive totem, hive totem resilience
hive totem toxicity.benefits: do constitution damage with a bite while raging

hurling.benefits: increase the range and size allowed for a hurled object

greater hurling.benefits: increase the range and size allowed for a hurled object

lesser hurling.benefits: you can lift and throw large objects to do damage

hurling charge.benefits: you can hurl an object as part of a charge

impelling disarm.benefits: once per rage, you may attempt to hit another opponent with a weapon you disarmed from a different opponent.

inspire ferocity.benefits: use a move action to share reckless abandon with allies

internal fortitude.benefits: gain immunity to nauseated and sickened conditions

intimidating glare.benefits: intimidate an opponent as a move action

knockback.benefits: make a bull rush in place of a melee attack

knockdown.benefits: make a trip attack in place of a melee attack

lethal accuracy.benefits: deal more damage when you score a critical hit with surprise accuracy

linnorm death curse, cairn.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of negative energy damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of decay (will negates).

linnorm death curse, crag.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of fire damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of fire (will negates).

linnorm death curse, fjord.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of cold damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of drowning (will negates).

linnorm death curse, ice.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of cold damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed, the attacker suffers the curse of frost.

linnorm death curse, taiga.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of electricity damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of electricity (will negates).

linnorm death curse, tarn.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of acid damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of death (will negates).

linnorm death curse, tor.benefits: your melee attacks deal an additional 1 point of fire damage. If the character is knocked unconscious or killed by an attack or spell, the attacker suffers the curse of boiling blood (will negates).

liquid courage.benefits: alcoholic beverages give you a morale bonus while raging

moment of clarity.benefits: remove benefits and penalties of raging for 1 round

night vision.prerequisites: low-light vision rage power or racial low-light vision

no escape.benefits: double move as an immediate action when an opponent withdraws

overbearing advance.benefits: deal extra damage when using the overrun maneuver

penetrating bite.benefits: when using animal fury while raging, your bite is able to pierce most resistances.

perfect clarity.benefits: roll twice when disbelieving an illusion

powerful blow.benefits: deal extra damage with a single blow

primal scent.benefits: gain a bonus when using scent

quick reflexes.benefits: make additional attacks of opportunity while raging

raging climber.benefits: gain a bonus on climb checks while raging

raging flier.benefits: 1/rage, fly up to your base speed as a move action and can use this flight as part of movement during a charge.

raging grappler.benefits: while raging, whenever you succeed at a check to start a grapple, you can choose to deal damage as if you had also succeeded at a check to maintain the grapple. In addition, while raging, whenever you succeed at a combat maneuver check to maintain a grapple, you can choose to give yourself, the target of your grapple, or both the prone condition as a free action while continuing to maintain the grapple.

raging leaper.benefits: gain a bonus on acrobatics checks to jump while raging

raging swimmer.benefits: gain a bonus on swim checks while raging

reckless abandon.benefits: take a penalty to ac for extra accuracy while raging

reflexive dodge.benefits: use your rolling dodge bonus on reflex saving throws

regenerative vigor.benefits: gain fast healing after using renewed vigor

renewed life.benefits: ignore temporary negative levels while raging

renewed vigor.benefits: heal damage as a standard action

renewed vitality.benefits: ignore ability damage or penalties while raging

roaring drunk.benefits: gain a bonus on intimidate checks and fear effect dc

rolling dodge.benefits: gain a dodge bonus to ac against ranged attacks while raging

roused anger.benefits: enter a rage even when fatigued

savage dirty trick.benefits: once per round while raging, you can attempt a dirty trick combat maneuver in place of a melee attack.

savage intuition.benefits: you may enter a rage even if you arent aware that combat has begun

savage jaw.benefits: while raging, you can open your jaws wide and latch your teeth firmly onto your opponent.

scent.benefits: gain the scent ability when raging

sharpened accuracy.benefits: surprise accuracy ignores concealment and cover

smasher.benefits: when sundering an unattended object, ignore hardness

spell sunder.benefits: sunder spells with a combat maneuver check

spellbreaker.benefits: gain the spellbreaker feat while raging

spirit steed.benefits: your mount gains dr/magic and its natural weapons count as magical

spirit totem.benefits: attacks against you may miss when you are raging

greater spirit totem.benefits: enemies near you take negative energy damage

lesser spirit totem.benefits: gain spirit allies that can attack adjacent enemies

sprint.benefits: move at x3 or x6 speed once per rage

staggering drunk.benefits: gain dodge ac against attacks of opportunity if drinking

strength surge.benefits: gain a strength bonus on combat maneuver checks

superstition.benefits: gain a bonus on saving throws

surprise accuracy.benefits: gain a morale bonus on one attack roll

terrifying howl.benefits: cause shaken enemies to become panicked

ultimate clarity.prerequisites: barbarian 6, moment of clarity, perfect clarity
ultimate clarity.benefits: 1/rage, for 1 round, see through normal and magical darkness (including from magical effects such as blur and displacement), invisibility, and illusions; and discern exact locations of creatures with concealment.

unexpected strike.benefits: enemies provoke attacks of opportunity even when they normally wouldnt

water sense.benefits: your senses are no longer fooled by the rippling surface and confounding reflections seen in water that is being used as cover by your foes.

world serpent totem.benefits: gain bonuses against outsiders and abberations

world serpent spirit.benefits: your weapon counts as chaotic, evil, good, lawful while raging

world serpent totem unity.prerequisites: barbarian 6, world serpent spirit, world serpent totem
world serpent totem unity.benefits: double fast movement bonus and cannot be knocked prone

lunar totem.benefits: bite attack deals increased damage, higher critical multiplier, and less penalties on attack rolls.

greater lunar totem.benefits: gain dr/silver and a bonus on saves against curses while raging.

lesser lunar totem.benefits: gain a bonus to ac and saving throws against undead and shapechangers.

greater shadow totem.benefits: gain see in darkness ability while raging and immunity to blindness.

lesser shadow totem.benefits: deal strength damage when scoring a critical hit.

death totem.benefits: while raging, gain dr 5/bludgeoning and +2 resistance bonus against cold-based spells and effects.

greater death totem.prerequisites: barbarian 12, death totem, lesser death totem
greater death totem.benefits: while raging, nearby living enemies damaged by death energies and must make fortitude save or be sickened.

lesser death totem.benefits: while raging, roll fortitude saves twice and choose the best result.
